description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
cause paralysis.
description.ruby-sapphire:
An electrical attack that
may paralyze the foe.
description.emerald:
An electrical attack that
may paralyze the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An electric shock
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.
description.diamond-pearl:
A jolt of electricity
is hurled at the foe
to inflict damage.
It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

A jolt of electricity
is hurled at the foe

It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

at the target to inflict damage. It may
also leave the target with paralysis.

A jolt of electricity is hurled

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
